name: Pin Board Puzzle
description:
Find the best way to unblock the boards.

HOW TO PLAY:
• Solve new puzzles at every level.
• Move pins to unlock the boards.
• Exercise your brain in this ultimate awesome puzzle game!

FEATURES:
• No time limits.
• One finger control.
• Multiple unique levels
• FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Pin Board Puzzle at your own pace!
